pages.actionChangeValidatorsDesc: Update your validator nominations to improve rewards
pages.actionManageStakingDesc: View and manage your staking positions
pages.actionOptimizeReturnsDesc: Review and adjust your validator selection to improve rewards
pages.actionReviewPoolDesc: Check your pool's performance and consider alternatives
pages.assignedToAnyAccount: Your Root, Nominator and Bouncer roles can be assigned to any account.
pages.automaticallyBonded: Automatically bond payouts to your existing staked balance.
pages.availableToClaim: The outstanding amount of {{unit}} available to claim by pool members.
pages.beenClaimedBy: The total amount of {{unit}} that has been claimed by pool members.
pages.bondedInPools: The total {{networkUnit}} currently bonded in nomination pools.
pages.closePool: You can now withdraw and close the pool.
pages.connectWalletForRecommendation: Connect your wallet to learn your staking recommendation
pages.connectWalletPrompt: Please connect your wallet to access personalized information, recommendations, and manage your staking activities.
pages.considerPoolStaking: Consider pool staking until you reach the minimum
pages.controllerNotImported: You have not imported your controller account. If you have lost access to your controller account, set a new one now. Otherwise, import the controller into one of your active extensions.
pages.dashboardIntro: Your comprehensive platform for managing and optimizing your Polkadot staking experience. This dashboard provides powerful tools and insights to help you maximize your staking rewards.
pages.directNominationBenefit2: Full control over your staking strategy
pages.directNominationBenefit3: No pool fees - keep all your rewards
pages.featureMonitor: Monitor your staking performance in real-time
pages.featureRewards: Track and claim your staking rewards
pages.featureStake: Stake your DOT tokens and earn rewards
pages.fullCommissionValidatorSubtitle: You will not receive staking rewards from validators who charge 100% commission. Consider updating your nominations.
pages.fullCommissionValidatorTitle: You Have a Nomination with 100% Commission
pages.highCommissionAlertDesc: You have nominated {{count}} validator(s) with 100% commission. This means you won't receive any rewards from these validators.
pages.joinPoolHeading: Join {{totalMembers}} pool members staking a total of {{totalPoolPoints}} {{unit}} on {{network}}.
pages.leftThePool: All members have now left the pool
pages.networkCurrentlyStakedSubtitle: The total {{unit}} currently being staked amongst all validators and nominators.
pages.nominationPoolsDescription: Join a pool to stake with any amount of DOT
pages.paidOutLastEraSubtitle: Total amount paid out as rewards in the last era to stakers.
pages.paidOutLastEraTitle: was paid out in the last era.
pages.payoutDestinationSubtitle: Choose how payouts will be received. Payouts can either be compounded or sent to an account as free balance.
pages.permissionToUnbond: You have permission to unbond and withdraw funds of any pool member. Use a member's menu
pages.poolCreator: As the pool creator, you will consume your pool's Depositor role.
pages.poolDestroy: Pool is being destroyed and nominating is no longer possible.
pages.poolMembersBonding: pool members are actively bonding in pools.
pages.poolNameSupport: Pool names support characters, symbols and emojis - be creative!
pages.poolStakingAlternativeIntro: While you have enough DOT for direct nomination, pools offer:
pages.poolStakingRecommendBenefit2: Professional pool operators manage validator selection
pages.poolStakingRecommendBenefit3: Join other stakers to share rewards
pages.readOnly: Your account is read only, and cannot sign transactions.
pages.recommendationHighCommission: You have nominated {{count}} validator(s) with 100% commission. Consider changing these nominations.
pages.recommendationLowPerformance: Your staking performance is below the network average. Consider reviewing your validator selection.
pages.recommendationPoolPerformance: Your pool's performance is below the network average. Consider reviewing your pool selection.
pages.rewardCalcSubtitle: Enter a {{unit}} amount to stake and calculate the potential rewards.
pages.soloNominatingDescription: Direct nomination for advanced stakers with 250+ DOT
pages.stakingHealthHealthy: Healthy - Your position is in line with the staking averages
pages.stakingHealthUnhealthy: Unhealthy - Your position is underperforming, please review
pages.stakingHealthVeryHealthy: Very Healthy - Your position is outperforming the staking average
pages.stakingTip3: Compound rewards to maximize your returns
pages.stopNominating: To continue with pool closure, stop nominating.
pages.testnetNoPriceData: No price data available for testnets
pages.enableStakingApi: Enable the Staking API plugin for price data
pages.totalNumAccounts: The total number of accounts that have joined a pool.
pages.unbondYourFunds: You can now unbond your funds.
pages.unstakePromptInQueue: You are in the fast unstake queue. You will not be able to carry out any nominator tasks while you are registered for fast unstake.
pages.unstakePromptReadyToWithdraw: Your bonded funds are now unlocked and ready to withdraw.
pages.unstakePromptRevert: If you no longer wish to unstake, rebond your {{unit}} and start nominating again.
pages.unstakePromptWaitingForUnlocks: Waiting for unlocks to become available to withdraw.
pages.welcomeMessage: Welcome to your Polkadot Staking Dashboard. Here you can monitor your staking performance, manage your validators, and optimize your rewards.
pages.whatYouCanDo: With the Staking Dashboard, you can:
pages.withdrawUnlock: Withdraw your unlock chunk to proceed with pool closure.
pages.youAreCurrentlyStakingInAPool: You are currently staking in a pool
pages.youAreCurrentlyStakingInAPoolWithId: You are currently staking in Pool {{poolId}} ({{poolName}})
